channel.title: Deferred Opportunities on Jessica S. Marquis
channel.description: Recent content in Deferred Opportunities on Jessica S. Marquis

item.title: day #69
item.description: spent last weekend in a screenwriting workshop. this is a passion i’ve put off for a while. i’ve dabbled here & there, but i wouldn’t allow myself to dive in. with bob’s encouragement, i did it. it was a huge time & $ commitment, but it was worth it. i stretched. i was uncomfortable. i was creative. and now there is no turning back. to have that kind of opportunity & not do anything with it is ungrateful & unwise.
